sentences.en: After my lecture, the students began to overwhelm me with questions.
sentences.cn: 讲课之后, 学生们开始问一系列问题,使我不知所措.

sentences.en: But the era, its ruins and its overwhelm us with facts.
sentences.cn: 但是这个满目疮痍 、 血淋淋的年代仅用事实就让我目不暇接.

sentences.en: But the various pros and cons should not blindly overwhelm one another.
sentences.cn: 但是，众多的利弊得失不应盲目的一个压倒另一个。

sentences.en: Don't attack your opponent until you can overwhelm him.
sentences.cn: 在你部队成型之前不要攻击你的对手.

sentences.en: Don't just win the match; overwhelm your opponents by about 20 goals to nil.
sentences.cn: 不只是要赢这场比赛, 而且要以大约20∶0的比分压倒对方.

sentences.en: Don't let the process overwhelm you or weigh you down.
sentences.cn: 不要让找工作将你压得喘不过气或打垮你.

sentences.en: Dull butcheries on a gigantic scale and mass effects overwhelm all detached sentiment.
sentences.cn: 大规模的无情屠杀和群众意向压倒了一切公平意见.

sentences.en: Find a print and color combination that doesn't overwhelm you.
sentences.cn: 挑一款最适合你的印花和颜色的搭配.

sentences.en: For example, in a situation in which several bystanders need to band together to overwhelm a perpetrator, they will be more likely to act collectively than to act alone.
sentences.cn: 例如, 就有这样一种情况， 在只有几个旁观者需要联合起来才能压倒一个罪犯的情况下, 他们就可能会更多地采取集体行动。

sentences.en: Grief overwhelmed me.
sentences.cn: 我悲痛不已。

sentences.en: He knows that they must be alluring enough to overwhelm the mind.
sentences.cn: 他知道这些试探必须足够迷人,才可以颠覆人的心意.

sentences.en: Imps mean swarms of little winged creatures that will overwhelm enemy forces.
sentences.cn: 小鬼的出现,意味着大群有翅膀的小生物将会把敌人淹没.

sentences.en: In 1532 the Spaniards finally overwhelmed the armies of Peru.
sentences.cn: 1532年，西班牙人最终打垮了秘鲁军队。

sentences.en: It was clear that one massive Allied offensive would overwhelm the weakened enemy.
sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，盟军一次大规模的进攻就会击溃已是强弩之末的敌军。

sentences.en: No difficulty can overwhelm us.
sentences.cn: 困难压不倒我们.

sentences.en: Such rapid influxes of sediment probably overwhelm the bottom dwellers in an area.
sentences.cn: 沉积物如此迅速的汇集可能把这一地区的海底生物全部淹没了.

sentences.en: The army was overwhelmed by the rebels.
sentences.cn: 军队被叛乱者完全击败了。

sentences.en: The raider, cornered at length, will overwhelm one weak vessel and escape.
sentences.cn: 袭击舰即便最后被它们团团围住, 它也会摧毁其中一艘较弱的巡洋舰, 突围而出.

sentences.en: The signal from the largest tends to overwhelm the others.
sentences.cn: 最大体积的行星发出的讯号总是会覆盖其它行星的讯号.

sentences.en: Those little bits can come together and almost overwhelm the world.
sentences.cn: 这一点一滴最终能够汇聚起来,几乎可以克服任何困难.

sentences.en: We try not to think about it because it would overwhelm us to an extent that we would just vegetate.
sentences.cn: 我们尽量不去想它，因为在某种我们能够想像到的程度上他会压倒我们。

trans.tran_cn: 使不知所措，使难以承受，淹没，征服，压倒，击败，（感情或感觉）充溢
trans.tran_en: to have such a strong emotional effect on sb that it is difficult for them to resist or know how to react

trans.tran_cn: 使受不了， 使不知所措； 征服， 制服
trans.tran_en: if someone is overwhelmed by an emotion, they feel it so strongly that they cannot think clearly
